title: I am in Class 12 and I want to complete the syllabus as soon as possible. How do I study? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best way to complete the syllabus as soon as possible is to start early. I’ll give you my example when I was in class 12. I started studying it from June. By October end before Diwali Celebrations, I covered the whole syllabus at least once. This really helped me covering the syllabus again and revising it at least 2 times before the exams. If you have joined private tutors or coaching classes, then ask the faculty about the course timeline beforehand. Its really important to set the timelines for very subject and strictly adhere to the same. Also, there have been many cases when schools do not provide good teachers for a particular subject or do not put much focus on their curriculum. It’s important to ignore the classes and do not waste your precious time in the school. Yes, I am saying to skip classes in the case of poor teachers. Don’t bother about the attendance as it’ll be taken care of. It will really help you for long term and develop the habit of self study.
